sentences.english: This is an example of cecal volvulus .
sentences.chinese: 此图所示的为盲肠扭转。

sentences.english: And some living animals have a cecum and an appendix.
sentences.chinese: 有些活着的动物既有盲肠又有阑尾。

sentences.english: The argyrophil cells in the cecum mainly distribute in the connective tissue.
sentences.chinese: 在盲肠的嗜银细胞主要分布在结缔组织内。

sentences.english: However, thus far, there are no reports on lesions of the cecum.
sentences.chinese: 但是源自于盲肠之黏液性囊腺瘤仍然从未被报告过。

sentences.english: B CT scan of the lower abdomen shows beaking and collapsed bowel loops at the retrocecal recess.
sentences.chinese: 下腹部CT扫描显示盲肠后隐窝处肠管塌陷呈鸟嘴征。

sentences.english: He was hospitalized last night for acute appendicitis.
sentences.chinese: 他昨晚因得了急性盲肠炎而被送进医院。

sentences.english: Composed of caecum, colon and rectum.
sentences.chinese: 由盲肠，结肠和直肠组成。

sentences.english: Location of efferent neurons of caecum in fowl;
sentences.chinese: 探讨白术对鸡离体空肠和盲肠运动张力的影响。

sentences.english: I feel pain around the caecum.
Inflammation of the cecum of the large intestine.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候动过盲肠炎手术。

sentences.english: Carnivorous animals have a very small caecum .
sentences.chinese: 食肉类动物的盲肠很小。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical diagnosis and treatment of cecal diverticulitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨盲肠憩室炎的临床诊断与治疗。

sentences.english: Upon opening the cecum, the invaginated appendix was recognized.
sentences.chinese: 打开盲肠即发现套叠的阑尾。

sentences.english: Significant changes are seen in the cecum in about 50 percent of the cases.
sentences.chinese: 在约50%的病例中，可看到盲肠有明显变化。

sentences.english: The superior ileocecal recess is bounded in front by the vascular fold of the cecum and behind by the ileal mesentery.
sentences.chinese: 回盲上隐窝在盲肠血管襞前方和回肠系膜的后方。

sentences.english: Methods Mouse sepsis model was established using cecal ligation and puncture (CLP).
sentences.chinese: 方法采用盲肠结扎穿孔术建立小鼠脓毒症模型。

definition: ascending colon (anatomy)/first section of large intestine
sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum
transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine
descending colon (anatomy)/third section of large intestine
